doc:
Beatrice Van https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beatrice_Van 0 Beatrice Van (August 8, 1890, Omaha, Nebraska – July 4, 1983, Long Beach, California) was an American silent film actress. She was also a screenwriter for both silent and sound films. Beatrice married actor James Gruen and they had one child together named Kreigh Vander-Pluym in 1912. Beatrice_Van ( August_8_,_1890 , Omaha , Nebraska – July_4_,_1983 , Long_Beach , California ) was an_American_silent_film_actress . She was also a_screenwriter for both_silent_and_sound_films . Beatrice married actor James_Gruen and they had one_child together_named Kreigh_Vander-Pluym in 1912 .
